examples: A spokesman claimed that the target was a nearby bank.
Un portavoz afirmó que el objetivo era un banco cercano.
So as the chief economic spokesman.
Así que como el principal portavoz económico.
A spokesman for his record company said.
Dijo un portavoz de su compañía discográfica.
I am just a spokesman of his words.
Solo soy un portavoz de sus palabras.
